 This pause will cost you

HOW TO PLAY Collect items as quickly as possible. ${##} tasks appear at the bottom. Don't just focus on one item! You will get extra points for collecting two different items consecutively! Cat Dog Peach A task will get a "" when all the items needed for the task are collected. When all ${##} tasks are complete, you will enter the next round.

<color=#66463e><size=60><outline color=fff8ee width=1>HOW TO PLAY</outline></size>


<size=30>The faster you collect,
 the more Bonus Points you get.

You get Bonus Points when you
 collect items before the 
countdown ends.





You have <color=#e15333>${##}</c> chances.
The game will end when your 
<color=#e15333>${##}</c> chances run out.
The game is completed after
<color=#e15333>${##}</c> rounds of tasks. 
You earn Bonus Points for any time 
that remains when the game ends.
